drivers.name: Zigbee Sonoff - generic relays
drivers.description: Works with Sonoff MINI ZB,ZBMINI-L2,ZBMINIR2,Light switch ZBM5-1C-120,eWeLink,3A Smart Home and other generic zigbee relays. And generic outlets. State Verify module, Power Falure recovery, Presence,Lamp_01,Plug_01 , SA-003-Zigbee,01MINIZB,BASICZBR3,LXN59-1S7LX1.0, Sylvania SMART + LEDVANCE
